Google Summer of Code Contributions

Lorenz Walthert

2017-08-21

This vigette aims to summarize the contributions made to styler through Google Summer of Code 2017.

We can use the package gitsum to perform an analysis of the GitHub repository.

library("gitsum")
library("tidyverse")
## Loading tidyverse: ggplot2
## Loading tidyverse: tibble
## Loading tidyverse: tidyr
## Loading tidyverse: readr
## Loading tidyverse: purrr
## Loading tidyverse: dplyr
## Conflicts with tidy packages ----------------------------------------------
## filter(): dplyr, stats
## lag():    dplyr, stats
log <- git_log_detailed() %>%
  filter(date > as.Date("2017-06-01"), date < as.Date("2017-08-31"))

We can see that the vast majority of the commits in this period comes from the student and a few from the main mentor.

log %>%
  group_by(author_name) %>%
  count()
## # A tibble: 2 x 2
## # Groups:   author_name [2]
##       author_name     n
##             <chr> <int>
## 1   Kirill Müller    53
## 2 Lorenz Walthert   315
all_issues <- gh::gh("/repos/krlmlr/styler/issues", state = "all", filter = "all") %>%
  lapply("[")
  
issue_author <- 
  all_issues %>%
  map("user") %>%
  map("login") %>%
  flatten_chr()

issue_date <- 
  all_issues %>%
  map("created_at") %>%
  flatten_chr() %>%
  as.Date()
  
tabular_issue <- data_frame(author_name = issue_author, date = issue_date)

tabular_issue %>%
  filter(date > as.Date("2017-06-01"), date < as.Date("2017-08-31")) %>%
  group_by(author_name) %>%
  count()
## # A tibble: 2 x 2
## # Groups:   author_name [2]
##      author_name     n
##            <chr> <int>
## 1         krlmlr     3
## 2 lorenzwalthert    27

Developed by Kirill Müller, Lorenz Walthert.
